title: So much to offer, without breaking the budget!
neighborhood: Aurora - South Cherry Creek State Park
posting_body: ['IMT Cornerstar Ranch', 'Bedroom: 1 | Bathroom: 1', 'Square Footage: 926 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1805', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3
